about_the_game:
Have an erotic adventure of a lifetime in the final episode of College Bound!

The Grand Finale


College Bound: Episode 5 DLC is the final part of the epic adult visual novel developed by FOZ. Discover new plot threads, and find out the developments of the previous ones!

Help Anna find her missing dog to get rewarded, solve Mary's (fertility) problems, appreciate Shanice's art...and her curves. Find out who is behind cyber attacks on your university, play God in a life or death situation, teach your teachers a thing or two...and the list goes on and on!

Damn, in this Episode there's so much going on, it would take a week to list it. Go ahead and check it out yourself!

Sex Overload

A quickie on a train? Check. Threesomes with fit college girls and busty MILFs? Check. Full service from a working girl, stealing a wife from a dumb boss, virtual reality hookup too good to be real? Check, check, check. This episode has over 170 sex animations, each one hotter than the next. Sound effects included, of course. Live out your fantasies!

Stunning Graphics

The bar has been raised even higher. In this Episode, I have focused on beautiful graphics and realistic animations, while also increasing the amount of content compared to the previous one. This means that this part of the game has the most images, illustrations and dialogue than any other one from the College Bound franchise. Are you ready?

content_descriptors.notes:
This episode graphically depicts sex and includes mature themes. While most of the story is light-hearted, parts of it may be problematic for some individuals, especially those easily offended. Please consider this before playing College Bound. Outside of that, have fun and enjoy the ride! All of the scenes are animated, well developed and written to add to the story and the enjoyment of our players.

All characters depicted are at least 21 years of age or older and all sexual acts are consensual.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
